title: Oregon Trail Gravel Grinder Stage 4 Results: Cecile Lejeune and Griffen Easter Win Queen’s Stage
content:
The gravel race wraps up on Sunday with a 70-mile stage that takes participants back to the start in Bend, Oregon

Read the full article at Oregon Trail Gravel Grinder Stage 4 Results: Cecile Lejeune and Griffen Easter Win Queen’s Stage on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
